com.almasb.fxgl.time

Class TimerAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.time.TimerAction

  • public final class TimerAction
extends Object
    A wrapper for Runnable which is executed at given intervals. The timer can be made to expire, in which case the action will not execute
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  TimerAction.TimerType

      Updates the state of this timer action.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimerAction

        public TimerAction(long now,
                   javafx.util.Duration interval,
                   Runnable action,
                   TimerAction.TimerType type)
        Parameters:
        now - current time in nanoseconds
        interval - interval duration
        action - the action
        type - ONCE or INDEFINITE

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(long now)
        Updates the state of this timer action. If the difference between current time and recorded time is greater than the interval then the action is executed and current time is recorded.

        Note: the action will not be executed if the timer has expired

        Parameters:
        now - current time in nanoseconds

      • expire

        public void expire()
        Set the timer as expired. The action will no longer be executed

      • isExpired

        public boolean isExpired()
        Returns:
        true if the timer has expired, false if active
